testcase.brief: Configure the max domain name, only the last domain name can be matched
testcase.description: Topology to use Description Configure the max domain name, only the last domain name can be matched Pre-condition Set interface eth0 to wan mode Set interface eth1 to access mode and enable mac-learning Eth0 can obtain ip address from DHCP server Disable dhcp client on mgt0 and configure a static ip address Enable DHCP server on interface mgt0.1 Enable DNS server on mgt0.1 Set internal DNS server and external DNS server to mgt0.1 Set the max number internal domain name pattern(128) to mgt0.1 Set SSID and bind it to interface wifi0 Connect a client to SSID and make client obtain ip address from mgt0.1 Use Wireshark to capture packet on client and DNS server Set filter _ff id 1 dst-port 53 bidirectional Open debug _kdebug fe basic/detail and debug console Test procedure Send DNS request from clients and make it match the last domain name pattern, verify if DNS server can works normal, check memory Expect result Use the internal DNS server to resolution DNS request, memory is normal

step.desc: Set eth1 to access mode and enable mac-learning
step.telnet: -v "user-profile lan1 qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${br1.vpc1.vlan} attribute 1" -v "interface ${br1.br.lan.int1} mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 1" -v "interface ${br1.br.lan.int1} mac-learning enable"

step.desc: Enable DHCP server on interface mgt0.1 Enable DNS server on mgt0.1, Set DNS mode to nonsplit of mgt0.1
step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.1 vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options netmask 255.255.255.0" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options dns1 ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dns-server ext-resolve dns1 ${pub.dns2.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server enable" -v "interface mgt0.1 dns-server mode nonsplit" -v "interface mgt0.1 dns-server enable" -v "interface ${br1.br.lan.int3} shutdown"

step.script: i=0 while [ "$i" -lt "31" ] do echo "int mgt0.1 dns-server int-domain-name max-capacity1234567890$(expr 1234567800 + $i) 1.1.1.1$i" >> ${log.dir}/cap.txt i=$(expr $i + 1) done

step.telnet: -f ${log.dir}/cap.txt -v "interfac mgt0.1 dns-server int-domain-name ${cvg1.dns1.domain1} ${cvg1.dns1.ip}" -v "interfac mgt0.1 dns-server int-domain-name abc.test 10.1.1.1"
step.log-match: -e "maximum number (32) of domains have been configured!"

step.desc: br1.vpc1 get ip addr from dhcp server of mgt0.1
set br1.vpc1.tif.ip var for vpc1 on BR side
Set filter _ff id 1 dst-port 53 bidirectional,Open debug _kdebug fe basic/detail and debug console
step.telnet: -v "_debug dns" -v "_ff id 1 dst-port 53 bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail"
